events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected.
The support system has categorized this case as a refund request based on the customer's description.
Assigning this refund request case to customer service agent Lisa M. for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket has been used or damaged?
My order number is 8745123. The jacket is brand new, I only tried it on once but it doesnâ€™t fit well.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate the refund process for you. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid return label we'll send shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back this week.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount will reflect in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
Since the refund has been completed and no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting our support.
